attributes.contentHtml:
Why am i writing this thread
Am writing this thread because i bought a custom order of gaina which was bot hosting for 3 months
and out the no where he suspended it without telling me the reason
and am guessing it has to be me blocking dubs

Why did this happen

well gaina said hes going to report me because of selfbotting
which is really dumb as dubs has rise selfbot
so i blocked dubs then gaina said am going to make him cry FOR SOMTHING DUBS CAUSED
then he asked why then blocked me
i was planning to switch host then so i went on the panel and saw i could not backup my files

Overall

Overall gaina is someone to uses people ASKS for people accounts and go threw their dms
hes scammed me for somthing that was not involed with him

also gaina if you see this i would like the money back aswell

Creamo Hello, You may have bought bot hosting (I was told you got it for giving him my Spotify account) but.. you actually broke async.host terms of service therefore you were banned from the provider.

Gaina reported you for selfbotting... Because you were breaking discord tos?? I may own a selfbot but never use it.

I allow gaina to use my account for the times that I am very busy (like right now I am sick so he is replying to most dms) and he just happened to see you using your selfbot.

Async do not offer refunds especially when you break tos. They may offer refunds for 14 days but it was a lot longer than 14 days since you "purchased" anything from the hosting provider.

If you have any questions, please contact me on discord!

  • Dubs#7708
